name: custodial
content:
custodial adjective
(PRISON)
custodial sentence
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK a period of time that someone must stay in prison: Both men were given six-month custodial sentences.
See more
custodial adjective
(CARE)
relating to the legal right to care for someone or something, especially a child: custodial care

referring to or having the responsibility of protecting, caring for, or maintaining something or someone: custodial care a custodial staff
